name: Spooky Swing
description:
Spooky Swing is all about precision and timing! Use a rope to speed your way through various awesome mazes on this spooky adventure.

Collect gold gems and letters to unlock awesome new skins as you dash and swing your way to the finish. Use physics to collect more gems.

How far will you get? Install now to find out in this amazing arcade game brought to you by Tap Tap Games by Huuuge!
